title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A gripping tale of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the American South. Scout Finch narrates the story of her father, lawyer Atticus Finch, defending a black man falsely accused of rape in 1930s Alabama.

A dystopian social science fiction novel set in a totalitarian society ruled by Big Brother. Winston Smith works at the Ministry of Truth, rewriting history, but begins to rebel against the oppressive regime.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A romantic novel of manners following Elizabeth Bennet as she deals with issues of morality, education, and marriage in the landed gentry of early 19th-century England.

title: The Great Gatsby
description: A tragic story of Jay Gatsby and his obsessive pursuit of Daisy Buchanan, set in the Jazz Age of 1920s America. A critique of the American Dream and the decadence of the wealthy elite.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: An orphaned boy discovers he's a wizard and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Harry Potter faces dark forces while making friends and learning magic in this enchanting adventure.

title: The Hobbit
description: Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit, is swept into an epic quest to reclaim a treasure guarded by the dragon Smaug. A tale of adventure, courage, and unexpected heroism in Middle-earth.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
description: Holden Caulfield narrates his experiences in New York City after being expelled from prep school. A story of teenage rebellion, alienation, and the loss of innocence.

title: The Lord of the Rings
description: An epic high fantasy trilogy following Frodo Baggins on his quest to destroy the One Ring and defeat the Dark Lord Sauron. A tale of friendship, sacrifice, and the battle between good and evil.

title: Animal Farm
description: A satirical allegory of Soviet totalitarianism where farm animals rebel against their human farmer, only to find themselves under a new tyranny. A powerful critique of political corruption.

title: Brave New World
description: A dystopian novel set in a futuristic World State where citizens are genetically engineered and conditioned for predetermined roles. Explores themes of technology, control, and individuality.

title: The Chronicles of Narnia
description: Four siblings discover a magical wardrobe that leads to Narnia, a land of talking animals and mythical creatures. They join the lion Aslan in the battle against the White Witch.

title: Jane Eyre
description: An orphaned governess falls in love with her brooding employer, Mr. Rochester, but dark secrets threaten their happiness. A Gothic romance exploring themes of morality, social class, and feminism.

title: Wuthering Heights
description: A passionate and destructive love story between Heathcliff and Catherine Earnshaw set on the Yorkshire moors. A Gothic tale of revenge, obsession, and the supernatural.

title: The Diary of a Young Girl
description: The real diary of a Jewish girl hiding from the Nazis during World War II in Amsterdam. A poignant and powerful testament to the human spirit in the face of persecution.

title: Fahrenheit 451
description: In a future American society where books are outlawed and burned, fireman Guy Montag begins to question his role. A dystopian novel about censorship, conformity, and the power of literature.

title: The Hunger Games
description: In a dystopian future, teenagers are forced to fight to the death in a televised event. Katniss Everdeen volunteers to save her sister and becomes a symbol of rebellion against tyranny.

title: Divergent
description: In a society divided into five factions, Tris Prior discovers she's Divergent and doesn't fit into any single group. She must hide her identity while uncovering a conspiracy that threatens her world.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
description: Two teenagers with cancer meet at a support group and fall in love. A heartbreaking and beautiful story about life, death, and finding meaning in the face of mortality.

title: The Book Thief
description: Narrated by Death, this novel follows Liesel, a young girl living in Nazi Germany who steals books and shares them with others. A story of courage, friendship, and the power of words.

title: The Kite Runner
description: A powerful story of friendship, betrayal, and redemption set in Afghanistan. Amir seeks to atone for his childhood betrayal of his loyal friend Hassan against the backdrop of a changing country.

title: Life of Pi
description: After a shipwreck, a young Indian boy named Pi survives 227 days stranded on a lifeboat with a Bengal tiger. A philosophical adventure about faith, survival, and storytelling.

title: The Alchemist
description: A young Andalusian shepherd named Santiago travels to Egypt in search of treasure, learning profound lessons about following one's dreams and listening to one's heart along the way.

title: Gone Girl
description: When Amy Dunne disappears on her fifth wedding anniversary, her husband Nick becomes the prime suspect. A psychological thriller full of twists, lies, and dark secrets.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
description: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist and hacker Lisbeth Salander investigate a decades-old disappearance in this gripping Swedish crime thriller. Dark, complex, and utterly compelling.

title: The Da Vinci Code
description: Symbologist Robert Langdon unravels a mystery involving the Holy Grail, secret societies, and religious conspiracies. A fast-paced thriller blending art, history, and suspense.

title: Angels & Demons
description: Robert Langdon races against time to prevent the Illuminati from destroying Vatican City with antimatter. A thrilling adventure through Rome involving science, religion, and ancient secrets.

title: The Shining
description: Jack Torrance becomes the winter caretaker of the isolated Overlook Hotel with his family. As supernatural forces take hold, Jack descends into madness with terrifying consequences.

title: It
description: A group of childhood friends reunite to confront a shape-shifting evil entity that preys on children in their hometown of Derry, Maine. A horror epic about fear, friendship, and courage.

title: Carrie
description: A bullied teenage girl with telekinetic powers unleashes her fury on her tormentors at the high school prom. Stephen King's first published novel is a chilling tale of revenge and supernatural horror.

title: The Stand
description: After a deadly plague wipes out most of humanity, survivors must choose between good and evil in a post-apocalyptic America. An epic battle between light and darkness unfolds.

title: Dune
description: On the desert planet Arrakis, young Paul Atreides becomes embroiled in political intrigue and a struggle for control of the universe's most valuable substance, spice melange. A science fiction masterpiece.

title: Foundation
description: Mathematician Hari Seldon predicts the fall of the Galactic Empire and establishes the Foundation to preserve knowledge and shorten the coming dark age. A groundbreaking science fiction saga.

title: Neuromancer
description: A washed-up computer hacker is hired for one last job in cyberspace. This cyberpunk classic explores artificial intelligence, virtual reality, and corporate power in a dystopian future.

title: The Handmaid's Tale
description: In the totalitarian Republic of Gilead, women are subjugated and forced into reproductive servitude. Offred's story is a chilling dystopian warning about religious extremism and patriarchy.

title: The Road
description: A father and son journey through a post-apocalyptic America, struggling to survive and maintain their humanity in a world of ash and despair. A haunting meditation on love and survival.

title: The Martian
description: Astronaut Mark Watney is stranded alone on Mars and must use his ingenuity and scientific knowledge to survive until rescue. A thrilling, humorous, and scientifically accurate survival story.

title: Ready Player One
description: In a dystopian future, people escape reality through a virtual world called the OASIS. When the creator dies, he leaves behind a treasure hunt that could change everything.

title: Ender's Game
description: Brilliant child Andrew 'Ender' Wiggin is trained at Battle School to lead humanity's fight against an alien invasion. A science fiction classic exploring war, morality, and childhood.

title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
description: Arthur Dent is rescued from Earth's destruction by his alien friend Ford Prefect and embarks on a hilarious cosmic adventure. A comedic science fiction masterpiece full of wit and absurdity.

title: Slaughterhouse-Five
description: Billy Pilgrim becomes 'unstuck in time' and experiences his life non-linearly, including his experiences as a POW during the bombing of Dresden. A satirical anti-war novel.

title: Catch-22
description: Captain John Yossarian tries to survive World War II while dealing with the absurd bureaucracy of military life. A darkly comic satire of war and institutional madness.

title: The Color Purple
description: Celie, a poor black woman in the American South, overcomes abuse and oppression through the support of other women. An epistolary novel about resilience, love, and self-discovery.

title: Beloved
description: Sethe, an escaped slave, is haunted by the ghost of her dead daughter in post-Civil War Ohio. A powerful exploration of slavery's trauma and the struggle for freedom and identity.

title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
description: The multi-generational story of the Buendía family in the fictional town of Macondo. A masterpiece of magical realism exploring love, power, and the cyclical nature of history.

title: The Shadow of the Wind
description: In post-war Barcelona, young Daniel discovers a mysterious book that leads him into a labyrinth of secrets, forbidden love, and dark conspiracies. A Gothic mystery about books and obsession.

title: The Name of the Rose
description: Franciscan friar William of Baskerville investigates a series of murders at an Italian abbey in 1327. A medieval mystery combining semiotics, theology, and detective fiction.

title: Rebecca
description: A young woman marries a wealthy widower and moves to his estate, Manderley, where she's haunted by the memory of his first wife, Rebecca. A Gothic psychological thriller.

title: Dracula
description: Count Dracula attempts to move from Transylvania to England to spread the undead curse. A group of heroes led by Professor Van Helsing must stop him. The quintessential vampire novel.

title: Frankenstein
description: Victor Frankenstein creates a living being from dead tissue, but the creature's loneliness and rejection lead to tragedy. A Gothic novel exploring creation, responsibility, and humanity.

title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
description: A young man sells his soul so that a portrait ages instead of him, allowing him to pursue a life of hedonism without consequence. A philosophical novel about vanity, morality, and corruption.

title: The Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde
description: Lawyer Gabriel Utterson investigates the connection between his friend Dr. Jekyll and the evil Mr. Hyde. A classic tale of duality and the darkness within human nature.

title: Moby-Dick
description: Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to kill the white whale that maimed him leads the crew of the Pequod on a doomed voyage. An epic tale of obsession, fate, and the power of nature.

title: The Adventures of Huckleberry Finn
description: Huck Finn and runaway slave Jim travel down the Mississippi River on a raft, encountering adventure and confronting the moral complexities of pre-Civil War America.

title: Treasure Island
description: Young Jim Hawkins discovers a treasure map and sets sail with pirates and adventurers to find buried gold. A classic tale of adventure, betrayal, and coming of age.

title: The Count of Monte Cristo
description: Edmond Dantès is wrongfully imprisoned, escapes, finds treasure, and returns as the Count of Monte Cristo to exact elaborate revenge on those who betrayed him. A tale of justice and redemption.

title: The Three Musketeers
description: Young d'Artagnan joins the legendary musketeers Athos, Porthos, and Aramis in 17th-century France for swashbuckling adventures, political intrigue, and the motto 'All for one, one for all!'

title: Around the World in Eighty Days
description: Phileas Fogg bets he can circumnavigate the globe in 80 days and embarks on an extraordinary journey filled with obstacles, adventures, and unexpected romance.

title: Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea
description: Professor Aronnax is captured by the mysterious Captain Nemo aboard the submarine Nautilus and explores the wonders and dangers of the deep ocean. A pioneering science fiction adventure.

title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
description: Professor Lidenbrock and his nephew descend into an Icelandic volcano and discover a subterranean world filled with prehistoric creatures and geological marvels. A classic adventure novel.

title: The Time Machine
description: An inventor travels to the year 802,701 and discovers humanity has evolved into two species: the peaceful Eloi and the predatory Morlocks. A pioneering work of science fiction exploring evolution and class.

title: The War of the Worlds
description: Martians invade Earth with advanced technology, devastating humanity. A narrator struggles to survive and reunite with his wife. A groundbreaking alien invasion story and social commentary.

title: The Invisible Man
description: A scientist discovers how to make himself invisible but descends into madness and violence. A science fiction classic exploring the corruption of power and the dangers of unchecked ambition.

title: The Island of Dr. Moreau
description: A shipwrecked man discovers an island where a mad scientist conducts horrific experiments, creating human-animal hybrids. A disturbing exploration of ethics, evolution, and what it means to be human.

title: Lord of the Flies
description: A group of British boys stranded on an uninhabited island descend into savagery. A dark allegory about civilization, human nature, and the thin veneer of social order.

title: Of Mice and Men
description: Two migrant workers, George and Lennie, dream of owning land during the Great Depression. A tragic tale of friendship, dreams, and the harsh realities of American life.

title: The Grapes of Wrath
description: The Joad family leaves Oklahoma during the Dust Bowl and travels to California seeking a better life. An epic novel about poverty, injustice, and the resilience of the human spirit.

title: East of Eden
description: A multi-generational saga of two families in California's Salinas Valley, retelling the biblical story of Cain and Abel. An exploration of good, evil, and free will.

title: A Tale of Two Cities
description: Set during the French Revolution, this novel follows Charles Darnay and Sydney Carton in London and Paris. A story of sacrifice, resurrection, and the best and worst of humanity.

title: Great Expectations
description: Orphan Pip receives mysterious financial support and rises in society, but learns painful lessons about wealth, class, and what truly matters. A coming-of-age story set in Victorian England.

title: Oliver Twist
description: An orphan boy escapes a workhouse and falls in with a gang of pickpockets in London. A social novel exposing the harsh realities of poverty and child exploitation in Victorian England.

title: David Copperfield
description: The semi-autobiographical story of David Copperfield's journey from a difficult childhood to becoming a successful author. A rich portrait of Victorian society and human resilience.

title: The Odyssey
description: After the Trojan War, Odysseus embarks on a ten-year journey home to Ithaca, facing monsters, gods, and countless obstacles. An ancient Greek epic of adventure, cunning, and perseverance.

title: The Iliad
description: The epic tale of the Trojan War, focusing on the wrath of Achilles and the conflict between Greeks and Trojans. A foundational work of Western literature exploring honor, glory, and mortality.

title: Beowulf
description: The legendary Geatish warrior Beowulf battles the monster Grendel, Grendel's mother, and a dragon. An Old English epic poem about heroism, loyalty, and the struggle against evil.

title: The Divine Comedy
description: Dante journeys through Hell, Purgatory, and Paradise guided by the poet Virgil and his beloved Beatrice. An epic poem exploring sin, redemption, and divine justice.

title: Paradise Lost
description: An epic poem retelling the biblical story of the Fall of Man, Satan's rebellion, and Adam and Eve's expulsion from Eden. A profound exploration of free will, temptation, and redemption.

title: Don Quixote
description: An aging gentleman believes himself a knight-errant and sets out on absurd adventures with his squire Sancho Panza. A satirical masterpiece about idealism, reality, and the power of imagination.

title: Crime and Punishment
description: Impoverished student Raskolnikov murders a pawnbroker and grapples with guilt and moral philosophy. A psychological novel exploring morality, redemption, and the human conscience.

title: The Brothers Karamazov
description: Three brothers with contrasting personalities become embroiled in their father's murder. A philosophical novel exploring faith, doubt, free will, and morality.

title: War and Peace
description: An epic novel following five aristocratic families during Napoleon's invasion of Russia. A sweeping exploration of history, society, love, and the meaning of life.

title: Anna Karenina
description: Anna Karenina's passionate affair with Count Vronsky leads to her social downfall and tragic end. A novel about love, family, society, and the search for meaning.

title: The Master and Margarita
description: The Devil visits Soviet Moscow, causing chaos, while a writer's suppressed novel about Pontius Pilate comes to life. A satirical fantasy blending comedy, romance, and political critique.

title: Lolita
description: Humbert Humbert's obsessive and destructive infatuation with twelve-year-old Dolores Haze. A controversial and masterfully written novel exploring obsession, manipulation, and moral depravity.

title: The Bell Jar
description: Esther Greenwood's descent into mental illness during a summer internship in New York. A semi-autobiographical novel about depression, identity, and the pressures on women in 1950s America.

title: The Outsiders
description: Ponyboy Curtis and his gang of 'Greasers' clash with the wealthy 'Socs' in 1960s Oklahoma. A coming-of-age novel about class conflict, loyalty, and finding one's place in the world.

title: The Giver
description: In a seemingly perfect society without pain or choice, twelve-year-old Jonas is chosen to receive memories of the past and discovers dark truths. A dystopian novel about freedom and humanity.

title: A Wrinkle in Time
description: Meg Murry travels through space and time with her brother and friend to rescue her father from evil forces. A science fantasy adventure about love, courage, and the battle between light and darkness.

title: Charlotte's Web
description: A pig named Wilbur is saved from slaughter by the clever spider Charlotte, who weaves messages in her web. A beloved children's story about friendship, sacrifice, and the cycle of life.

title: The Little Prince
description: A young prince travels from planet to planet, meeting strange adults and learning about love, loss, and what matters in life. A philosophical fable for all ages.

title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
description: Alice falls down a rabbit hole into a fantastical world of peculiar creatures and nonsensical logic. A whimsical classic of children's literature full of wordplay and imagination.

title: The Secret Garden
description: Orphaned Mary Lennox discovers a hidden garden at her uncle's estate and, with new friends, brings it back to life. A story about healing, growth, and the transformative power of nature.

title: Anne of Green Gables
description: Imaginative orphan Anne Shirley is mistakenly sent to live with siblings Marilla and Matthew Cuthbert on Prince Edward Island. A heartwarming coming-of-age story about belonging and self-acceptance.

title: Little Women
description: The four March sisters—Meg, Jo, Beth, and Amy—grow up during the Civil War, facing challenges and pursuing their dreams. A classic novel about family, love, and female independence.

title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
description: Mischievous Tom Sawyer has adventures in the antebellum South, including witnessing a murder and searching for treasure. A nostalgic and humorous tale of boyhood and small-town America.

title: Where the Wild Things Are
description: Max sails to an island inhabited by wild creatures who make him their king. A beloved picture book about imagination, emotions, and the comfort of home.

title: Goodnight Moon
description: A little bunny says goodnight to everything in his room. A soothing bedtime classic with rhythmic text and gentle illustrations.

title: The Very Hungry Caterpillar
description: A caterpillar eats through various foods before transforming into a beautiful butterfly. A colorful and educational children's book about growth and transformation.

title: Green Eggs and Ham
description: Sam-I-Am persistently offers green eggs and ham to a reluctant character. A playful rhyming book about trying new things and keeping an open mind.

title: The Cat in the Hat
description: A mischievous cat brings chaos and fun to two children on a rainy day. A beloved rhyming story that has delighted generations of young readers.

title: Matilda
description: Brilliant young Matilda develops telekinetic powers and uses them to stand up to her cruel parents and tyrannical headmistress. A story about intelligence, justice, and the power of kindness.

title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
description: Poor Charlie Bucket wins a golden ticket to tour Willy Wonka's magical chocolate factory. A whimsical tale about greed, goodness, and wonderful confections.

title: James and the Giant Peach
description: Orphaned James escapes his cruel aunts inside a giant magical peach with insect friends. A fantastical adventure about friendship, courage, and finding family.

title: The BFG
description: Sophie befriends the Big Friendly Giant who catches and distributes dreams. Together they stop the other giants from eating children. A heartwarming story about friendship and bravery.

title: Where the Red Fern Grows
description: A boy raises two coon hounds in the Ozarks and experiences the joys and heartbreaks of life. A moving story about love, loyalty, and growing up.

title: Bridge to Terabithia
description: Two lonely children create an imaginary kingdom in the woods, but tragedy strikes. A powerful story about friendship, imagination, and coping with loss.

title: Holes
description: Stanley Yelnats is sent to a desert detention camp where boys dig holes daily. He uncovers the truth behind the digging and his family's curse. A clever adventure blending mystery and humor.

title: Percy Jackson & The Lightning Thief
description: Twelve-year-old Percy discovers he's a demigod and must prevent a war among the Greek gods. A modern fantasy adventure combining mythology with contemporary settings.

title: The Maze Runner
description: Thomas wakes up in a mysterious maze with no memory, surrounded by other boys. They must escape the deadly labyrinth and uncover the truth. A dystopian thriller full of suspense.

title: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
description: Clary Fray discovers a hidden world of Shadowhunters who hunt demons. She must find her missing mother and uncover her own mysterious past. An urban fantasy filled with action and romance.

title: Twilight
description: Bella Swan falls in love with vampire Edward Cullen in the rainy town of Forks, Washington. A paranormal romance about forbidden love and the supernatural.

title: The Host
description: An alien soul named Wanderer inhabits Melanie's body but can't suppress her consciousness. Together they navigate love and survival in a world controlled by aliens. A science fiction romance.

title: A Court of Thorns and Roses
description: Feyre kills a wolf and is taken to a magical faerie realm as punishment. She discovers romance, danger, and a curse threatening the fae world. A fantasy romance retelling of Beauty and the Beast.

title: Throne of Glass
description: Assassin Celaena Sardothien competes to become the king's champion in exchange for her freedom. A high fantasy series filled with action, magic, and political intrigue.

title: Six of Crows
description: A crew of six outcasts attempts an impossible heist in a magical world. A fantasy adventure with complex characters, clever plotting, and diverse representation.

title: The Cruel Prince
description: Mortal Jude is raised in the treacherous High Court of Faerie and must navigate political intrigue and dangerous romance. A dark fantasy about power, ambition, and survival.

title: Red Queen
description: In a world divided by blood color, Mare discovers she has powers despite being a Red. She's thrust into the Silver court and a dangerous rebellion. A dystopian fantasy about class and revolution.

title: An Ember in the Ashes
description: A scholar and a soldier's paths cross in a brutal empire inspired by ancient Rome. A fantasy epic about resistance, loyalty, and survival under tyranny.

title: The Selection
description: Thirty-five girls compete for Prince Maxon's heart in a televised competition. America Singer enters reluctantly but finds unexpected love. A dystopian romance blending The Bachelor with royalty.

title: Caraval
description: Scarlett receives tickets to the legendary Caraval performance where the line between game and reality blurs. A magical fantasy about sisters, love, and illusion.

title: Children of Blood and Bone
description: Zélie fights to restore magic to her West African-inspired world after a brutal king destroyed it. A fantasy adventure about oppression, heritage, and revolution.

title: The Poppy War
description: War orphan Rin aces the empire's test and discovers she has a dangerous power connected to shamanism and gods. A dark fantasy inspired by Chinese history exploring war and its consequences.

title: The Night Circus
description: Two young magicians are bound in a competition that takes place in a mysterious circus that appears without warning. A enchanting fantasy about magic, love, and destiny.

title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
description: Addie makes a Faustian bargain to live forever but be forgotten by everyone she meets. After 300 years, she finds someone who remembers her. A fantasy about memory, art, and immortality.

title: Circe
description: The story of the witch Circe, exiled to an island, who transforms from an outcast into a powerful sorceress. A feminist retelling of Greek mythology.

title: The Song of Achilles
description: The love story between Achilles and Patroclus during the Trojan War, told from Patroclus's perspective. A beautiful retelling of Greek mythology exploring love and fate.

title: American Gods
description: Ex-convict Shadow Moon is caught in a war between old gods and new in modern America. A fantasy blending mythology, Americana, and the power of belief.

title: Good Omens
description: An angel and demon team up to prevent the apocalypse. A comedic fantasy about the end of the world, friendship, and humanity's quirks.

title: Neverwhere
description: Richard Mayhew falls through the cracks into London Below, a magical underworld. He must navigate this dangerous realm to return home. An urban fantasy adventure.

title: The Ocean at the End of the Lane
description: A man returns home and remembers supernatural events from his childhood involving ancient powers and a mysterious family. A dark fantasy about memory and magic.

title: Coraline
description: Coraline discovers a door to an alternate world with sinister versions of her parents. She must be brave to escape and save her family. A creepy children's fantasy.

title: Stardust
description: Young Tristran crosses into the magical realm of Faerie to retrieve a fallen star for his beloved. A romantic fantasy adventure filled with wonder and danger.

title: The Graveyard Book
description: Nobody Owens is raised by ghosts in a graveyard after his family is murdered. A coming-of-age fantasy about belonging, danger, and growing up between two worlds.
